Paper Tigers is a testament that just one caring adult can help break the cycle of adversity in a young person's life.

‚Ä¢ Avoiding excessive exposure to media coverage of COVID-19, including social media.
‚Ä¢ Taking care of your body. Exercise, take deep breaths, stretch or meditate.
‚Ä¢ Trying to eat healthy foods and get enough sleep. Avoid alcohol, drugs and tobacco.
‚Ä¢ Doing something you enjoy. Talking to friends and family. Share your concerns and how you are
feeling with someone you trust.
